DOC.brief_summary: The purpose clinical research study examine acute hormonal metabolic effect drug olanzapine , well appetite effect , healthy volunteer . The hypothesis test : ( 1 ) Olanzapine rapidly attenuate plasma leptin ( 2 ) rapidly alters glucose tolerance healthy volunteer . These question answer volunteer undergo two glucose tolerance test crossover study design .
DOC.brief_title: A Crossover Study Acute Effects Olanzapine Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy Volunteer Body Mass Index 18.525 kilogram per square meter Must able swallow tablet Able give inform consent Any DSMIV TR Axis I psychiatric disorder ( except nicotine dependence ) Presence medical disorder may confound assessment relevant biologic measure , include : significant organ system dysfunction , metabolic disease , type 1 diabetes mellitus , type 2 diabetes mellitus , pregnancy , endocrine disease , coagulopathy , clinically significant anemia , acute infection Subjects take antipsychotic medication within last 6 month Personal family history seizure and/or cardiac arrhythmia
